thread.title: Dogs Follow Injured Man Into Ambulance And Hospital To Make Sure He Is Okay
thread.title_full: Dogs Follow Injured Man Into Ambulance And Hospital To Make Sure He Is Okay

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Dogs Follow Injured Man Into Ambulance And Hospital To Make Sure He Is Okay
text:
Dogs Follow Injured Man Into Ambulance And Hospital To Make Sure He Is Okay Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
When paramedics were called to save a man who had fallen and hurt his head on a street in Chimbote, Peru, they weren’t expecting to find him being tenderly watched over by his two dogs. Seguridad Ciudadana Chimbote 
They quickly realized that the dogs refused to be parted from the wounded man’s side, so they decided it would be easier to bring him with him. After the man was carried into an ambulance, the dogs hopped inside too. 
A video of the event shows that that the dogs rode with him in the ambulance to the hospital. (Note: the video below may take a few seconds to load.) 
They also accompanied him into the hospital. 
Seguridad Ciudadana Chimbote shared photos of one of the dogs resting on the gurney next to his human as care workers look him over. Seguridad Ciudadana Chimbote 
Photos posted to Facebook later in the day by a hospital intern show the man in a wheelchair with his dogs still by his side. 
Ejemplo de lealtad… Los pacientes del día 
Posted by Joha Morillas Zapata on Monday, December 26, 2016 
“Example of loyalty,” Joha Morillas Zapata wrote. “The patients of the day.” 
It seems that the man is on the mend, no doubt, in part thanks to the loving support of his faithful friends.
